org.orgName: Supreme Court of the United States

div1.p: Supreme Court of the United States. October Term, 1896
Costs of The State of Washington in No. 91

1896, October Term - Transfer, $1.00; appearance, .25; filing precipe and receipt, , filing papers, , filing briefs, $5.00; argument, .20; submission, .20; judgement, $1.00; filing same, .25; recording, .40; mandate, $5.00; preparing record for printers, etc., $9.00; cost of printing record, $17.50; attorney's docket fee, $20.00; costs and copy, .40
Test: James H.M. Kenney Clerk Supreme Court U. S.
